l:dependency.name: Airwatch Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Jenkins plugin to deploy artifacts to Airwatch container

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: Commons IO
l:dependency.l:description: The Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters, file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

l:dependency.name: Xerces2 Java Parser
l:dependency.l:description: Xerces2 is the next generation of high performance, fully compliant XML parsers in the Apache Xerces family. This new version of Xerces introduces the Xerces Native Interface (XNI), a complete framework for building parser components and configurations that is extremely modular and easy to program.

l:dependency.name: Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.
